SEARCH
Package nsk.enhanced.System.Configuration

Class ServerConfiguration

java.lang.Object
nsk.enhanced.System.Configuration.ServerConfiguration
public class ServerConfiguration extends Object
The ServerConfiguration class handles the loading, accessing, and reloading of the server's configuration and translation files. It manages the `config.yml` and `translations.yml` files used by the plugin.

  • Constructor Details

    • ServerConfiguration

      public ServerConfiguration()

  • Method Details

    • load

      public static void load()
      Loads the server configuration files. This method is responsible for initializing and loading the `config.yml` file and the `translations.yml` file.

    • loadConfiguration

      private static void loadConfiguration()
      Loads the `config.yml` file from the plugin's data folder. If the file does not exist, it is created from the plugin's resources.

    • getConfig

      public static org.bukkit.configuration.file.FileConfiguration getConfig()
      Returns the loaded config.yml configuration.
      Returns:
      the config.yml FileConfiguration object

    • loadTranslations

      private static void loadTranslations()
      Loads the translations.yml file from the plugin's data folder. If the file does not exist, it is created from the plugin's resources.

    • getTranslations

      public static org.bukkit.configuration.file.FileConfiguration getTranslations()
      Returns the loaded translations.yml configuration.
      Returns:
      the translations.yml FileConfiguration object

    • reloadConfiguration

      private void reloadConfiguration()
      Reloads the server configuration files. This method reloads the config.yml and translations.yml files and logs the success or failure of the operation.
